## Cisco-IOS-XR-um-multicast-routing-cfg.yang

- [XPaths Obsoleted](#xpaths-obsoleted)

### Description

Changed the next-hop address type in static rpf to ip from ipv6.

## XPaths Obsoleted

N/A

N/A

N/A

- (L3929)	/multicast-routing/address-family/ipv6/interface
